creator: rajdeep.raut@rediffmail.com
text:
Hi,

When we have upgraded tomcat version from 8.0.14 to 8.0.21, web services are inaccessible from SoapUI(though its opening in browser).No error is visible in SoapUI,but it's keep on loading unless u manually stop this. Could you please let us know how to resolve this issue.

 

Thanks,
Rajdeep Raut

There is insufficient information in this report for a Tomcat developer to investigate.

Please ask your question on the Apache Tomcat user mailing list and, if that discussion concludes that there is a bug in Tomcat, then re-open this issue and provide the necessary information to recreate the issue from a clean install of the latest 8.0.x release.
creator: markt@apache.org
